User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the HolyHarmonies application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

profilePictureUrl.description: URL to the user's profile picture.

Song.title: Song
Song.description: Represents a song with chords uploaded by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Song entity.

chords.description: The song's chord progressions and lyrics.

uploadDate.description: Date and time when the song was uploaded.

originalSongId.description: If the song is a copy, this is the ID of the original song.

Variation.title: Variation
Variation.description: Represents a user-submitted variation of an existing song.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Variation entity.

variationText.description: The user-submitted variation of the song.

submissionDate.description: Date and time when the variation was submitted.

Playlist.title: Playlist
Playlist.description: Represents a user-created playlist of songs, with real-time session capabilities.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Playlist entity.

isPublic.description: Indicates whether the playlist is public or private.

songIds.description: References to Songs in the playlist. (Relationship: Playlist N:N Song)

liveSessionId.description: Unique ID for the real-time session room.

currentSongId.description: The ID of the song currently being played in the session.

transpose.description: The number of semitones to transpose the current song.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. Accessible only by the user with matching userId for writes, but readable by all.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

definition.description: Top-level collection for all songs. Readable by all, writable only by the owner.

params.name: songId
params.description: The unique identifier of the song.

definition.description: Stores variations of a song submitted by users. Readable by all, writable only by the owner of the variation.

params.name: songId
params.description: The unique identifier of the song.

params.name: variationId
params.description: The unique identifier of the variation.

definition.description: Stores user-created playlists. Includes the userId of the playlist creator for authorization independence. This is the private copy.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

params.name: playlistId
params.description: The unique identifier of the playlist.

definition.description: Public access collection for playlists to allow sharing.

params.name: playlistId
params.description: The unique identifier of the playlist.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is updated to support community features. The `songs` collection is now at the top level to allow public read access, which is necessary for users to browse other users' songs. User profiles in `/users/{userId}` are also made publicly readable. Write access remains restricted to owners. This model enables song sharing and discovery while maintaining data ownership and security.
